examples: She seemed neither surprised nor worried.
No parecía ni sorprendida ni preocupada.
He wasn't there on Monday. Nor on Tuesday, for that matter.
No estuvo allí el lunes. Ni el martes, de hecho.
Not a building nor a tree was left standing.
No quedó ni edificio ni árbol en pie.
She doesn't like them and nor does Jeff.
A ella no le gustan ni a Jeff.
